item.title: K3s Install Notes
item.description: K3 Install Notes Pre-Setup For 8Gb host use external mounts ln -s /datadrive/k3s/ /run/k3s ln -s /datadrive/k3s-pods/ /var/lib/kubelet/pods ln -s /datadrive/k3s-rancher/ /var/lib/rancher ## Install ```sh '--disable' \ 'traefik' \ '--disable' \ 'servicelb' \ '--disable' \ 'metrics-server' \ '--disable' \ 'local-storage' \ '--write-kubeconfig-mode 644' \ '--node-label "k3s-upgrade=true"' \ '--flannel-backend=wireguard-native' For worker nodes need: K3S_TOKEN is at /var/lib/rancher/k3s/server/node-token on server K3S_URL is “https://:6443” Setting up upgrades Install upgrade server kubectl apply -f https://github.

item.title: Kubernetes Notes
item.description: Your Kubernetes control-plane has initialized successfully! * Kubeadm init to start the cluster off. Success: #To start using your cluster, you need to run the following as a regular user: mkdir -p $HOME/.kube sudo cp -i /etc/kubernetes/admin.conf $HOME/.kube/config sudo chown $(id -u):$(id -g) $HOME/.kube/config You should now deploy a pod network to the cluster. item.title: Idrac Notes
item.description: How to restart/power off from idrac terminal # power server off racadm serveraction powerdown # power server on racadm serveraction powerup # perform server power cycle racadm serveraction powercycle # force hard server power reset racadm serveraction hardreset

item.title: Powerline fonts in ChromeOS ssh client
item.description: For folks using powerline status bar, the correct font is important to ensure that powerline displays properly. The custom CSS file located here can be placed in the user ssh box of the ChromeOS ssh client. Originally from github/wernight
